headline: pass
pros: management is good if you follow rules, they listen. Willing to train.

headline: Great Opportunities
pros: Worked for the Bank for 2.5 years. Excellent staff, incredible opportunities for those who work hard. Management is highly supportive. Great working environment. All employees are friendly and knowledgeable. I highly recommend this employer.
cons: There are no cons for the review.

headline: Salary
pros: At the time, great manager and willing to help.
cons: Work environment was a bit depressing.

headline: Poor Technology
pros:
- Everyone is nice and willing to teach you
- Not many things to do during work
cons:
- Low growth
- Technology in the office is so backward.

headline: bank teller
pros: good working environment and friendly location

headline: Toxic
pros: Short work hours and that's it

headline: retail sales manager
pros: The is not one single Pro to working for this bank.
